revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox dungeon |name = Valley Windworks |image = [[File:Valley Windworks.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of the Valley Windworks. |tokens = 43,000 |location = East of Floaroma Town. }} The '''Valley Windworks''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |-..."
